item.title: Do Chipmunks Live Underground?: The Answer
item.description:
We may earn a commission when you click and buy from Amazon.com.

Chipmunks are small animals classified under the squirrel family. They may visit your farm or home in search of food or a place to live. **Chipmunks mostly appear during the day. It is not easier to spot these animals while moving. They run very fast and camouflage well with environment. ** **So, do Chipmunks live underground? The direct answer is YES! Chipmunks dig burrows underground with their paws and create underground rooms for breeding, storage of gathered food and sleeping. **
